ProjectTitle: Development of a novel in situ phenotyping methodology to measure nitrification in the rhizosphere.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
07/02/2023
Data: please also list your physical data in the table (e.g. soil samples) 
Documentation: please explain here how you wil document your data for yourself and others, for example using protocols, readme files, notebooks etc. Will you use metadata generated with your analysis? 
Storage: please note that data stored on onedrive is stored in the cloud outside of KU Leuven and not on the KU Leuven servers, please clarify which storage solution and backup you are using, for more information see: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Sharing: earlier you mention that you will deposit your data in RDR which is a data repository for data sharing, please als add this under "where will the data be made available" (if you are planning to use this), for more information see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr.
